common.tauri_api_not_loaded: Tauri API not loaded, please restart the app

accounts.import_invalid_format: Invalid JSON format, please ensure the file contains email and refresh_token fields
accounts.disabled_tooltip: Account is disabled (e.g. refresh_token revoked/expired). Reauthorize or update token to re-enable.
accounts.forbidden_tooltip: API returned 403 Forbidden, account has no permission for Gemini Code Assist

fix_guide.title: Terminal Quick Fix (Resolves internal 403s)
fix_guide.step1_desc: Open your Terminal and run the following command to tell Google "it's me", which resolves most 403 blocks:
fix_guide.step1_li1: Press Enter, input <1>Y</1> when prompted to continue.
fix_guide.step1_li2: Your browser will open automatically, select your account and click "Allow".
fix_guide.step1_li3: Once you see <1>You are now authenticated</1>, you're all set!
fix_guide.step2_li1_prefix: Run this to clear your old credentials:
fix_guide.tip1: If you still get 403, try running <1>unset GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS</1> in terminal first.
fix_guide.tip2: For production environments, using a <1>Service Account</1> JSON key is highly recommended for stability and headless operation.
fix_guide.tip3: If it still fails, check the Generative Language API in <1>Google Cloud Console</1> to see if permissions are frozen. If so, your account is under risk control. Please let the account cool down for 72 hours before trying again.
fix_guide.tip4: You can also try <1>npm install -g @google/gemini-cli</1>. If it doesn't throw errors, simply deleting and re-authorizing the account in the app will likely fix it.

device_fingerprint_dialog.title: Device Fingerprint
device_fingerprint_dialog.current_storage_desc: Read from storage.json (updated after applying binding when switching accounts)
device_fingerprint_dialog.account_binding_desc: Saved as binding after generation/restoration, written to storage.json when switching accounts
device_fingerprint_dialog.confirm_generate_desc: Will generate a new set of device fingerprints and set as current fingerprint. Confirm continue?
device_fingerprint_dialog.confirm_restore_desc: Will restore to original fingerprint and overwrite current fingerprint. Confirm continue?

oauth.desc: Opens default browser for Google login to auto-fetch and save Token.
oauth.manual_hint: Browser didn't redirect? Paste the full callback URL or raw Code here:
oauth.web_hint: Google login page will open in a new window
oauth.manual_submitted: Authorization code submitted. Backend is processing...

token.label: Refresh Token
token.placeholder:
Paste your Refresh Token here (Batch supported)

Supported formats:
1. Single Token (1//...)
2. JSON Array (with refresh_token field)
3. Any text containing tokens (Auto-extraction)
token.hint: Tip: You can paste multiple tokens or a JSON array to import in batch.

import.scheme_a_desc: Auto-read current logged-in account from local Antigravity DB.

empty.title: No Accounts
empty.desc: Click the "Add Account" button above to add your first account

dialog.batch_delete_msg: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {{count}} accounts? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.delete_msg: Are you sure you want to delete this account? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.refresh_msg: Are you sure you want to refresh the quota for the current account?
dialog.batch_refresh_msg: Are you sure you want to refresh quotas for the selected {{count}} accounts? This may take some time.

general.title: General Settings
general.auto_launch_desc: Automatically launch Antigravity Tools when system starts
general.auto_check_update_desc: Automatically check for new versions on startup

account.title: Account Settings
account.auto_refresh_desc: Automatically refresh all account quotas in the background. This is required for quota protection.
account.auto_sync_desc: Automatically sync current active account information periodically

quota_protection.title: Quota Protection
quota_protection.enable_desc: Automatically disable account when quota falls below threshold, and auto-restore when quota resets
quota_protection.monitored_models_desc: Select at least one. Protection triggers if ANY selected model falls below threshold
quota_protection.example: Example: At {{percentage}}%, an account with {{total}} quota will be disabled when remaining ‚â§ {{threshold}}
quota_protection.auto_restore_info: Account will be automatically re-enabled when quota resets

pinned_quota_models.title: Pinned Quota Models
pinned_quota_models.desc: Choose which model quotas to display in the account list. Unselected models are only shown in the detail popup.

proxy_pool.title: Proxy Pool
proxy_pool.name: Name
proxy_pool.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this proxy?

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.default_export_path_desc: Files will be saved directly to this folder without asking
advanced.data_dir_desc: Account data and config file location
advanced.antigravity_path_desc: If you installed Antigravity in a non-standard location, you can manually specify the executable path here (Points to .app on MacOS).
advanced.antigravity_args_desc: Specify startup arguments for Antigravity, e.g. --user-data-dir to specify user data directory
advanced.page_size_desc: Set the number of accounts displayed per page. Select 'Auto Calculate' to dynamically adjust based on window size.
advanced.logs_desc: Clear log cache files. Does not affect account data.
advanced.clear_logs_msg: Are you sure you want to clear all log cache files?
advanced.antigravity_cache_desc: Clear Antigravity cache to resolve login failures, version validation errors, and OAuth authorization issues.
advanced.antigravity_cache_warning: Please ensure Antigravity is completely closed before clearing cache.
advanced.clear_cache_confirm_msg: The following cache directories will be cleared:
advanced.debug_logs_enable_desc: When enabled, records the complete request and response chain. Recommended to enable only when troubleshooting issues.
advanced.debug_logs_desc: Records the full chain: original input, transformed v1internal request, and upstream response. For troubleshooting only, may contain sensitive data.
advanced.debug_log_dir_hint: Leave empty to use the default directory: {{path}}/debug_logs
advanced.http_api_desc: Provides local HTTP interface for external programs (e.g. VS Code plugins).
advanced.http_api_enabled_desc: When enabled, external programs can manage accounts via HTTP interface
advanced.http_api_port_desc: Restart required after changing port. If port conflict occurs, please use another available port.
advanced.http_api_settings_saved: HTTP API settings saved, restart required to apply

debug.title: Debug Console
debug.desc: View real-time application logs for debugging
debug.disabled_desc: Enable to start recording application logs
debug.console_desc: View real-time application logs to troubleshoot issues.
debug.enable_desc: Enable to capture and display backend logs.
debug.debug_logging_desc: When enabled, records the complete request and response chain. Recommended to enable only when troubleshooting issues.

menu.title: Menu Display Settings
menu.desc: Select the function items to display in the menu bar. Hiding infrequently used menus can save space.
menu.selected_items_note: Selected items will be displayed in the top menu bar.

about.title: About
about.author: Author
about.brew_confirm_desc: The following command will be executed to update the app. A restart is required after the upgrade.
about.brew_quarantine_hint: If you see an "App is damaged" error after update, run in terminal:
about.brew_upgrade_success: Homebrew upgrade succeeded. Please restart the app to load the new version.
about.brew_restart_failed: Auto restart failed. Please close and reopen the app manually
about.brew_upgrade_failed: Homebrew upgrade failed. Try running manually: brew upgrade --cask antigravity-tools
about.brew_error_brew_not_found: Homebrew not found. Please ensure brew is installed
about.brew_error_brew_exec_failed: Failed to execute brew command. Try running manually in terminal
about.brew_error_brew_timeout: Homebrew upgrade timed out (3min). Try running manually: brew upgrade --cask antigravity-tools
about.brew_error_brew_already_latest: Already up to date, no upgrade needed
about.brew_error_brew_not_supported: Homebrew update is not supported on this platform
about.support_desc: If you find this project helpful, feel free to buy me a coffee! Your support is the biggest motivation for me to maintain this project.

advanced_thinking.title: Advanced Thinking & Global Config
advanced_thinking.description: Manage thinking capabilities, image modes, and global instructions.

thinking_budget.title: Thinking Budget
thinking_budget.description: Controls the token budget for AI deep thinking. Some models (e.g., Flash, -thinking suffix models) are limited to 24576 by upstream API.
thinking_budget.auto_hint: Auto mode: Automatically caps budget to 24576 for Flash, -thinking suffix models, and Web Search requests.
thinking_budget.adaptive_hint: Adaptive mode: The model automatically adjusts thinking budget based on task complexity. Recommended for Claude 4.6+.
thinking_budget.passthrough_warning: Passthrough: Uses caller's value directly. High values may cause failures.

options.enabled_desc: On: Preserves thinking chain, returns sketch + final image.
options.disabled_desc: Off: Disables thinking chain, generates single ultra-clear image (Quality First).

global_system_prompt.title: Global System Prompt
global_system_prompt.placeholder:
Enter global system prompt...
Example: You are a senior full-stack developer. Please respond in English.
global_system_prompt.long_prompt_warning: Prompt is quite long (over 2000 chars) and may consume significant context space.

update_notification.title: Updating...
update_notification.message: A new version is ready with optimizations and improvements. Current: v{{current}}
update_notification.restart_prompt: Update downloaded and ready to install. Restart now?

toast.not_ready: Update artifacts are not ready yet. Will retry later.

login.title: Secure Access Control
login.desc: Running in Web mode. Please enter management password or API Key to access.
login.placeholder: Enter management password or API Key
login.error_invalid_key: Invalid password or API Key, please try again
login.error_network: Network connection failed, please check if the service is running
login.note: Note: If a separate management password is set, please enter it; otherwise, enter API_KEY.
login.lookup_hint: If forgotten, run docker logs antigravity-manager to find Current API Key or Web UI Password

stream.timeout_error: Request timeout, please check your network connection
stream.connection_error: Connection failed, please check your network or proxy settings
stream.decode_error: Network unstable, data transmission interrupted. Try: 1) Check network 2) Switch proxy 3) Retry
stream.stream_error: Stream transmission error, please retry later
stream.unknown_error: Unknown error occurred, please retry later
